Title: Gentleman
Director: Mohana Krishna Indraganti, Mohana Krishna Indraganti
Writer: David Nathan (story), Mohana Krishna Indraganti (screenplay), Mohana Krishna Indraganti (dialogue), Sirivennela Seetharama Sastry (lyricist), Ramajogayya Sastry (lyricist), Miki Clarke
Actors: Nani, Surabhi, Niveda Thomas, Vennela Kishore
Plot: Catherine finds herself in a web of deception and lies when she finds out that the fiance of her friend Aiswarya might not be as "Gentleman" as he seem.
